name: Mini Game - Machine Gun Dinosaur
description:
Mini game based on the classic T-Rex Game, also called Chrome Dino is a game integrated into the Google Chrome browser to play while offline. With certain changes, the minigame was created as a way of learning new mechanics, in addition to being a way of deconstructing the original work.

Controls:

Where "Space" is for jumping; And "Left mouse button" is for shoot.
